citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Bibersteinia trehalosi comb. nov.
Key tests that allow the separation of Bibersteinia trehalosi from the other genera of the Pasteurellaceae are shown in Table 2.

For characteristics showing variation in Table 2, the type strain shows the following reactions: catalase and oxidase-negative, weak haemolysis on bovine blood agar, CAMP-positive, weak growth on MacConkey agar, yellowish pigment, production of acid from cellobiose, raffinose, aesculin, amygdalin, arbutin, gentiobiose and salicin, no acid production from glycerol and myo-inositol.
